applicationLogic.journal.trend
Class VolumeTrend

java.lang.Object
  applicationLogic.journal.trend.VolumeTrend

public class VolumeTrend
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a set of methods to analyze the trend trough volumes of a given Transaction object.

Author:
Staffiero

Method Detail

getAuthorsPerVolume

public java.util.List<dblp.social.hibernate.entities.Person> getAuthorsPerVolume(int volume)
                                                                          throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a set of Person. This set contains all the authors who authored a publication in the given volume, considering the given transaction.

Parameters:
volume - the volume number of interest.
Returns:
the set of authors for the given volume number
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getNewAuthorsPerVolume

public java.util.List<dblp.social.hibernate.entities.Person> getNewAuthorsPerVolume(int volume,
                                                                                    java.util.List<dblp.social.hibernate.entities.Person> previousAuthors)
                                                                             throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a list of Person containing all the new authors for the given volume number. An author is a new author if he does not appear in the list previousAuthors.

Parameters:
year - the year of interest.
previousAuthors - a list of "old" authors. Each author in this list will not be included in the returned list.
Returns:
a list of new authors.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getAuthorsVolumeTrend

public java.util.List<AuthorsStatistics> getAuthorsVolumeTrend()
                                                        throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a list of AuthorsStatistics, which contains, for each volume number: the number of total authors, the number of new authors and the number of total authors until the current volume number

Returns:
a list of AuthorsStatistics.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getAuthorsVolumeWindowTrend

public java.util.List<AuthorsStatistics> getAuthorsVolumeWindowTrend(int firstVolume,
                                                                     int lastVolume)
                                                              throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a list of AuthorsStatistics, within a given volumes range. for each year we have: the number of total authors, the number of new authors and the number of total authors (until the current year).

Parameters:
firstVolume - the first volume of the interval of interest.
lastVolume - the last volume of the interval of interest.
Returns:
null if firstVolume>=LastVolume, a list of AuthorsStatistics otherwise
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getPublicationsPerVolume

public int getPublicationsPerVolume(int volume)
                             throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns the total number of publications for a certain volume number, considering the given transaction.

Parameters:
volume - the volume of interest.
Returns:
the total number of publications for the given volume.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getPublicationsVolumeTrend

public java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> getPublicationsVolumeTrend()
                                                                  throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a list of PublicationStatistics, containing the number of publications for each volume number.

Returns:
a list of PublicationsStatistics.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getPublicationsVolumeWindowTrend

public java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> getPublicationsVolumeWindowTrend(int firstVolume,
                                                                               int lastVolume)
                                                                        throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a list of PublicationStatistics. The list contains the number of publications for each volume, for a given volume numbers range.

Parameters:
firstVolume - the first volume of the interval of interest.
lastVolume - the last volume of the interval of interest.
Returns:
a list of PublicationsStatistics, containing the number of publications for each year.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getGraphStatisticsByVolume

public GraphStatistics getGraphStatisticsByVolume(int volume)
                                           throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns informations about the co-authorship graph. The graph is built with all the authors and co-authorship relations of the given volume number. For each volume we have informations about: the graph size, the number of connected components in the graph (connected sub-graphs), the size of the largest connected component, the size of the second largest connected component, the average clustering coefficient of the largest connected component, the characteristic path length of the largest connected component, the diameter of the largest connected component.

Parameters:
volume - the volume number of interest.
Returns:
a GraphStatistics object containing informations about the co-authorship graph for the given volume.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getGraphStatisticsVolumeTrend

public java.util.List<GraphStatistics> getGraphStatisticsVolumeTrend()
                                                              throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns informations about the co-authorship graph for each Journal of the transaction. A separate graph is built for each volume, not considering the graphs of the previous volumes.

Returns:
a GraphStatistics object containing informations about the co-authorship graph for each volume.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
See Also:
getGraphStatisticsByVolume(int volume)

getIncrementalGraphStatistics

public java.util.List<GraphStatistics> getIncrementalGraphStatistics()
                                                              throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns informations about the co-authorship graph for each Journal of the transaction. Each graph is built on the graph of the previous year therefore the graph of the last volume will be the whole conference graph.

Returns:
a GraphStatistics object containing informations about the co-authorship graph for each volume number.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
See Also:
getGraphStatisticsByVolume(int volume)

getProductivityTrend

public java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> getProductivityTrend()
                                                            throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns the productivity rate, i.e. the average number of papers per author, for each volume of the transaction. For each year the productivity rate is computed considering also old authors who did not publish anything at the given volume.

Returns:
a list of PublicationsStatistics. For each object only the year and productivity fields are initialized.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getProductivityTrendActiveAuthors

public java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> getProductivityTrendActiveAuthors()
                                                                         throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns the productivity rate, i.e. the average number of papers per author, for each volume of the transaction. For each volume the productivity rate is computed considering only active authors, i.e. who published at least one paper, at the given volume.

Returns:
a list of PublicationsStatistics. For each object only the year and productivity fields are initialized.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
